name: Magische Steine
overview: A 2D RPG Adventure game created in the style of Ultima by Ralf Prescher and Published in 64'er 1993/09. 15 years ago, the island of Aldora was conquered by the magician Tenomy and his horrific hordes of monsters. They were chosen by the inhabitants of Aldora. Destroy Tenomy You will be equipped with 1000 gold coins and 150 rations that will not last very long. Luckily for you, there are many villages on Aldora where you can calf. You can buy armor and rations. In order to be able to pay for all this, you have to fight Tenomy's monsters and capture their treasures. to open Tenomy's tower; to do this you need to find nine magic stones. The magician has hidden these in six dungeons or on the island and has them guarded by strong monsters.
